Posts.Content: momofgirls wrote: I received a call from my radiologist yesterday.  I have "intrusive cancer" as both the large mass I found 4 weeks ago and one of my lymph nodes are both canerous.  I have an appointment on Friday with a breast surgeon and oncologist.  These docs are with the Overlake Breast Cancer Center in Bellevue, Washington.  Anyone have experience there?  What do you all suggest re: second opinions? Trying to breathe and take my journey ahead one day at a time! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Just Diagnosed - Overlake Breast Cancer Center - Docs & opinions momofgirls Denise-G
